title: When They See Us
brief_description: When They See Us (2019) is an American crime drama created, co-written and directed by Ava DuVernay. It’s based on events of the 1989 Central Park jogger case and explores the lives and families of the five falsely accused subjects.

constellations_other.name: The world's end
constellations_other.description: For people of colour oppressed by systemic racism, genre stories about the end of the world and cosmological monsters can be used to re-examine race and the injustices faced in real life.

constellations_other.name: Presumption of guilt
constellations_other.description: A Constellation looking at true crime documentaries, the nature of innocence and prejudice.

description: When They See Us (2019) is an American crime drama created, co-written and directed by Ava DuVernay. It’s based on events of the 1989 Central Park jogger case and explores the lives and families of the five male suspects who were falsely accused then prosecuted on charges related to the assault.
description_for_label: When They See Us (2019) is an American crime drama created, co-written and directed by Ava DuVernay. It’s based on events of the 1989 Central Park jogger case and explores the lives and families of the five male suspects who were falsely accused then prosecuted on charges related to the assault.
